Scholastic | Assistant Project Coordinator, Associate Project Manager | New York, NY | Onsite | Full Time

Scholastic is the world's largest children's book publisher. We are looking to fill positions working in product and project management. The currently open one is available for applications here: https://scholastic.referrals.selectminds.com/jobs/assistant-...

The above position is a fairly entry level one managing websites and marketing through a CMS. We also will have an Associate Project Manager position managing development, if you're interested in that feel free to drop a line to gbrown@scholastic.com.
